scripts.nuke: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules/ && lerna clean
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run minify:toolkit-core && npm run minify:toolkit && npm run gzip
scripts.test:toolkit-core: cd packages/sky-toolkit-core && npm run test && cd -
scripts.test:toolkit-ui: cd packages/sky-toolkit-ui && npm run test && cd -
scripts.test: npm run test:toolkit-core && npm run test:toolkit-ui
scripts.gzip: gzip -6 build/toolkit{,-core}.min.css && mv build/toolkit-core.min.css.gz build/toolkit-core.min.css && mv build/toolkit.min.css.gz build/toolkit.min.css
scripts.circle: npm run bootstrap && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
